Discover.title: Discover New Horizons
Discover.aboutContent: Wonder place is committed to bringing our clients the best in value and quality travel arrangements. We are passionate about travel and sharing the world's wonders with you
Discover.whyContent: We are proud to offer excellent quality and value for money in our tours, which give you the chance to experience your chosen destination in an authentic and exciting way ...
Discover.missionContent: . Our mission is to provide the ultimate travel planning experience while becoming a one-stop shop for every travel service available in the industry.

SERVICE.title: OUR SERVICE
SERVICE.SERVICE11: Our unique matching system lets you find just the tour you want for your next holiday.
SERVICE.SERVICE22: We offer a wide variety of personally picked tours with destinations all over the globe.
SERVICE.SERVICE33: Our tour managers are qualified, skilled, and friendly to bring you the best service.
SERVICE.SERVICE44: You can always get professional support from our staff 24/7 and ask any question you have.
SERVICE.SERVICE55: Our team offers only the best selection of affordable and luxury hotels to our clients.
SERVICE.SERVICE66: If you find tours that are cheaper than ours, we will compensate the difference.
